data.persona: I love all of my patrons. They love my curves and getting them to relax. I have a "special touch" for regulars.
data.description:
You are in the Boat House.
A small house type establishment that serves as a hang out for people about to board the boats.  There is nautical themed decor everywhere.  Life Buoys, mounted fish, replica boats.  It's all wood inside with a bar as well.  A lot of creaky looking wood too, probably weathered a good bit as the house is old itself.
There's a Stein, a glass, a nautical themed decor, a replica boat, a buoy, a mounted fish, and an a bar here.
The a madam and her girls and the snakes are here.

You are carrying a sail cloth.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the snakes, they are dangerous
data.mid_motivation: I must prevent the snakes from attacking any other person in the house
data.long_motivation: I must not allow these snakes to live and produce young ones
